function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to high concentration of infectious aerosols in the air","Impact":"Increased probability of infection for susceptible individuals","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation systems and airflow plans to dilute infectious aerosols","Technologies":"Ventilation systems like mixing-type ventilation, piston flow ventilation, and push-pull ventilation","People":"Occupants in indoor environments, especially in shared spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, ventilation engineers"},{"Description":"Poor indoor air mixing leading to non-uniform concentration of bioaerosols","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of probability of infection using the Wells-Riley model","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper air mixing through effective ventilation design and positioning of air supply and return vents","Technologies":"Mixing-type ventilation systems, airflow analysis tools","People":"Occupants in indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, ventilation engineers"},{"Description":"Uncontrolled quantum generation rate of infectious aerosols","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately estimating the probability of infection using the Wells-Riley model","Mitigation":"Determine quantum generation rates for specific infectious aerosols to improve model accuracy","Technologies":"Quantum generation rate measurement tools, air quality sensors","People":"Indoor environmental researchers, ventilation engineers","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
